alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 01 at 1:09PM MST until March 02 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Dripping Springs. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne. Minor tree damage possible.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.
